name: etd-university
description: Système de gestion d'emploi du temps universitaire - UY1 ICT 203

scripts.start: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix backend" "npm run dev --prefix frontend"
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix backend" "npm run dev --prefix frontend" "npm run open-app"
scripts.open-app: node -e "const exec = require('child_process').exec; const url = 'http://localhost:5173'; const cmd = process.platform === 'win32' ? 'start chrome --app=' + url : 'google-chrome --app=' + url + ' --new-window'; setTimeout(() => exec(cmd), 3000)"
scripts.electron:dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix backend" "npm run dev --prefix frontend" "wait-on http://localhost:5173 && electron ."
scripts.electron:build: npm run build --prefix frontend && cd backend && npm install --production && npx prisma generate && cd .. && electron-builder
scripts.build:linux: npm run build --prefix frontend && cd backend && npm install --production && npx prisma generate && cd .. && electron-builder --linux
scripts.build:win: npm run build --prefix frontend && cd backend && npm install --production && npx prisma generate && cd .. && electron-builder --win

author: Groupe - ICT 203
